actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from State Department; Commerce Department.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to terminate certain export controls imposed on December 30, 1981, and June 22, 1982.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to terminate the export controls imposed for foreign policy purposes on December 30, 1981, and June 22, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to terminate certain export controls imposed on December 30, 1981, and June 22, 1982.
